name: Inseparable (folayfila)
description:
You play with two joined characters in a puzzle-platformer, where each character has a specific ability.  You have to use these abilities to win, but be careful, they shouldn't be separated for long!!

Controls: 

Move      :      w-s-a-d 

Jump       :       Space

Switch to pink : Q - 1

Switch to blue : E - 2

Join them : C

Interact/Grab : Left Click - F

Restart : R

Esc : Return to main menu

I have made all the assets and sounds during the time of the jam using :

- Unreal Engine 4

- Blender

- bfxr

This is my second game jam, I hope you have a good time trying out my game :)
